definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Do not clutter up the page with so many illustrations that you obscure the message.
sentences.chinese: 不要在一頁內放置過多的插圖，那樣會模糊訊息。

sentences.english: None of these champions remotely resembles the long-side illustration.
sentences.chinese: 插圖顯示沒有一個冠軍使用類似長的身體姿勢的姿勢。

sentences.english: A small illustration of this is the experience of Richard Garriott.
sentences.chinese: 這副小小的插圖描繪的正是理查德加雷特的親身經歷。

sentences.english: I am fond of the book with lots of beautiful illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡那本里面有許多精美插圖的書。

sentences.english: Have you seen the artwork roughs for the new book?
sentences.chinese: 你看到那本新書的插圖草稿了嗎？

sentences.english: Burgess was more nervous about his drawings.
sentences.chinese: 伯吉斯對他的插圖更爲緊張。

sentences.english: It is beautifully illustrated with color illustrations, photographs, and scanning electron micrographs.
sentences.chinese: 它被用顏色插圖，照片和掃描電子顯微照片說明得好。

sentences.english: Frontispiece illustration on the page facing the title page of a book.
sentences.chinese: 卷首插圖和扉頁照面的頁上插圖。

sentences.english: Frontispiece illustration on the page facing the title page of a book.
sentences.chinese: 卷首插圖和扉頁照面的頁上插圖。

sentences.english: Only use neons in artistic illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 僅使用霓虹燈藝術插圖。

sentences.english: A large percentage of school-books now have pictures.
sentences.chinese: 現在大部分教科書有插圖。

sentences.english: Are you good at VECTOR illustration and enjoy working in Illustrator, Freehand or Corel Draw ?
sentences.chinese: 或者你想爲我們創造了許多有趣的矢量插圖批次？

sentences.english: Beautiful full-color illustrations accompany the easy-to-read text.
sentences.chinese: 本書內容簡單易懂，彩色插圖精美漂亮。

sentences.english: illustrationSoftware security remains a hot topic.
sentences.chinese: 插圖軟件安全性依然是熱點話題。

sentences.english: Let's act out the story. I am Mocky. You are my friends. Look at this picture?
sentences.chinese: 讓學生兩人一組，看故事主要插圖，練習對話。
這是一本有精美插圖的教科書。

definition: to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
